'''Gary''' is a resident of Monica and Chandler's building. He appears in "[[The One With All The Candy]]" when he wakes up [[Monica Geller|Monica]] and [[Chandler Bing|Chandler]] in the middle of the night demanding holiday candy.

He hits on Monica, before Chandler abruptly closes the door on him.
